explanation: [0-0] There is a fruit stand on the street. A man wearing a mask sits in front of the stand, wearing a black mask and a plaid shirt. There are some fruits in the glass cabinet of the fruit stand.

[0-7] The man turns his head to look forward, and the camera zooms in on a pair of hands wearing white gloves. The right hand is holding a watermelon and the left hand is holding a fruit knife. The left hand cuts off both ends of the watermelon with the knife. Then the two hands stand the watermelon upright and cut off two pieces of rind.
